title: U.S. Southwest Swelters Under Dangerous Heat Wave
description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix advised people to follow its heat safety tips.

title: Tesla’s First Electric Pickup Has Rolled Off the Assembly Line, Company Says
description: The company tweeted a photo on Saturday showing scores of workers in helmets and yellow vests surrounding the truck.

title: Israel’s Netanyahu Is Rushed to Hospital for Dehydration
description: Netanyahu's office said he was hospitalized after feeling mild dizziness.

title: Long Island Serial Killer Probe Not Over After Man is Charged in 3 of 11 Deaths
description: Rex Heuermann, 59, is accused of killing Melissa Barthelemy, Megan Waterman and Amber Costello over a decade ago.

title: Mega Millions Jackpot Grows to $640 million
description: he numbers drawn late Friday night were: 10, 24, 48, 51, 66 and gold Mega Ball 15.

title: Hundreds of Flights Across Italy Are Canceled Amid Air Transport Strike at Peak of Tourism Season
description: Summertime in Italy is often the peak season for transport strikes.

title: The Arctic Feud That Divided America
description: In 1909 two explorers claimed to have reached the North Pole and then one accused the other of lying. Their feud gripped the country

title: These Climate Activists are Standing up to German Police
description: "Our civilization as we know it will collapse. And that's what we have to prevent," says co-founder of Last Generation, Melanie Guttmann.

title: What America’s Aging Population Means for Family Caregivers Like Me
description: America is aging fast. Technology can help us ride out the silver tsunami, writes Shauna Sweeney.
